t: Amazon.com : Donell Lip Saver : Therapeutic Skin Care Products : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I have been using Donell Lip Saver for well over 10 years (was introduced to it by my Dermatologist while on Accutane). It is THE BEST "lip stuff" hands down. It doesn't even compare to the drugstore and grocery store $2 or $3 stuff. You absolutely get what you pay for and this is worth the money.
